pages.text: $(li)The Furnace is a basic utility block that you can use to smelt items and cook food.
$(li)To use it, first you have to place the Furnace and right click on it.
$(li)Now you have to insert fuel in the second slot.

pages.title: Fuel Items
pages.text: $(li)Wood$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/charcoal)Charcoal$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/coal_block)Coal Block$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/lava_bucket)Lava Bucket$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/blaze_rod)Blaze Rod$(/l)$(li)Blaze Lantern.$(br)$(li)Then you have to insert the item to smelt in the first slot.$(br)$(li)After a few seconds you can pick up the result and add it into your inventory.
